name: Anino's Odyssey
description:
Anino's Odyssey is an action-adventure game created and maintained by AE development team.

Work on this project started in October 2022 with the target to build an innovative action-adventure game with outstanding features like enemy fighter AI, self-made fancy graphics and audio, online progress sharing and plenty-full game content.

🕹How to play

After you open up the game all you have to do is, click the New Game button, to enter the magical world of Anino's Odyssey. All that's left after that is to sit back, go with the flow and enjoy the ride.

🎨Game features

Anino's Odyssey offers you a host of features ranging from immersive world design, multiple item tiers and levels to experience and strong enemies to conquer. Race with your friends to see whose level is higher and items are better.

What are you waiting for ? Hop into the world of Anino's Odyssey defeat your enemies, obtain their valuable loot and become the greatest fighter of antiquity.
